text: Nurul Huq Choudhury was a Member of the 2nd National Assembly of Pakistan as a representative of East Pakistan. ==Career== Choudhury was a Member of the 2nd National Assembly of Pakistan. He served as the Minister of Central Public Works Department. ==References== Category:Pakistani MNAs 1955–1958 Category:Living people Category:People of East Pakistan Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Nurul Huq Choudhury
